mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT n.mtboard_no, m.member_nick, n.field, n.jobduty, n.jobgroup, n.career , n.mtboard_title, n.mtboard_content , n.mtboard_cmcnt , n.mtboard_hit , n.mtboard_date, n.co_name, n.mt_price , ( SELECT count(*) FROM mtmark MK WHERE N.mtboard_no = MK.mtboard_no ) mark_cnt FROM mtboard n JOIN member m ON ( n.member_no = m.member_no ) ORDER BY mtboard_date DESC ) B ) MtBoard WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }
